name: City Transport Bus Simulator

Enjoy bus real driving with city highway adventure. Coach Bus is the mind blowing tourists transport driver game. Enjoy the realistic and authentic bus physics that make the offroad 6x6 chained tourist coach bus different from the other bus driving games. Being a furious fastest bus highway tourist duty driver is a tough job! Be careful at sharp city asphalt road turns and on offroad tracks avoid the bus crash and drop passengers safely.

Coach bus is the modern public tourist city transport in beautiful mountain uphill tourist simulate bus driving environment. Bus legend coach is ready to drive in the dangerous hill offroad tracks. You are the furious fast bus city highway duty coach driver but you have to drive your bus in the hilly mountains. Uphill area or downhill slopes in the bus king hill station offroad game will test your drive skills on luxury commercial bus modern coach.
